title: 'Absolutely Horrendous Product and Service!'
body: I recently purchased the Portronics Adapto 70 33W Fast Wall Charging Adapter, and I must say that it has been nothing short of a complete disaster! To put it bluntly, this product is a steaming pile of garbage, and the seller's response to my issue has only added to my embarrassment.  First of all, the adapter stopped working after just 20 days of use. Yes, you read that right â€“ 20 days! I expected a product from a supposedly reputable brand like Portronics to last longer than a couple of weeks. It's not like I was using it to power a small nuclear reactor; I was just charging my phone!  Now, let's talk about the seller's response. It was as embarrassing as it gets. When I reached out to them to complain about the faulty product, they acted like I was trying to scam them out of a million dollars. It took days for them to respond to my initial message, and when they finally did, they asked for every piece of information under the sun, including the product's serial number, my purchase receipt, and even a blood sample (okay, maybe not the blood sample, but you get the idea).  After jumping through all these hoops and providing the required information, they had the audacity to blame me for the product's failure, suggesting that I must have mishandled it or used it incorrectly. Excuse me, but I've been plugging things into outlets for years without any issues, thank you very much!  A Note from seller :- Note - We work with a carry-in warranty policy, we don't have an onsite/pickup service. Courier charges are non-refundable by the company.  You need to pay Courier charges from your own pocket and its your choice to go with this Brand in the name of MADE IN INDIA.  To make matters worse, they refused to offer a refund or a replacement, leaving me stuck with a useless piece of junk and a gaping hole in my wallet. So, not only did I waste my money on a defective product, but I also had to endure the humiliation of dealing with a seller who clearly has no regard for customer satisfaction.  In conclusion, I wouldn't wish this product or the seller's pathetic customer service on my worst enemy. Save yourself the embarrassment and avoid the Portronics Adapto 70 33W Fast Wall Charging Adapter at all costs. You'll thank me later!

title: 'Excellent product'
body: I'm delighted with my new charging adapter! It's incredibly efficient and charges my devices super fast. The compact design is perfect for travel, and the build quality feels sturdy and reliable. I also appreciate the multiple USB ports, which allow me to charge multiple devices simultaneously. Overall, it's a fantastic addition to my tech accessories, and I highly recommend it to others.

title: 'Very good and reliable product'
body: The adapter is good for the price value. It has both - type C port for fast charging and USB port for normal charging. The adapter can adjust itself according to the current rating of the device being charged. It's a good feature for this price band.!

title: 'Does not provide rated power'
body: 'Purchased this product after validating that it works for Macbook Air 13". Received the product and tested it for two days
column5: it worked fine. Ordered another product 2 days later as backup (when on travel). Used the product intermittently & today while on business travel
column6: I used the adapter & to my surprise both the adapters are not charging the laptop. Apparently
column7: the return window expired on 29 Aug and 2 Sep. I dunno
column8: whether Portronics will own this and send two 33W adapters as replacements.  Refer image for clarity. Have captured the timestamp too.  Note: I am using an original "C type" cable that came with my Macbook Air laptop adapter.'

title: 'No superfast charging S23
body: iQ Z7'

This charger is not suitable for newer devices as far i have tested, they were all charging around 12w-18w.
